ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Kelin the dubiously talented song writer
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I am currently using this a LOT in Kern s tower. I have yet to have it fail on a white or *crosses fingers, throws salt over shoulder and sticks a black
ygData.messageBody:
> First, my experience with Kelin's Lugubrious Lament. When I
> first got that song it didn't work for me at
> all. Always resisted. Consistently got mobbed. But as I've
> leveled, it's become more useful. I really
> only try to use it on blues and I'm having a very good
> success rate (knock on wood).

I am currently using this a LOT in Kern's tower. I have yet to have it fail
on a white or *crosses fingers, throws salt over shoulder and sticks a black
cat bone in shoe* yellows.

It allows me to hunt solo there very handily, *this* song at least the bum
got right.

Tsengu



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
